content: from web page these fun two-toned crocheted mittens will keep your hands toasty on the coldest of days made out of 100% wool with a nice stretch cuff the quirky circle design will surely turn heads youth-size or size small ladies crocheted mittens are worked from top to bottom in rnds of half_double_crochet throughout cuff is crocheted with fpdc and bpdc and circle design in single_crochet
